materials.name: Standard Mat Board
drawbacks: Acid content can harm artwork over time
materials.recommendedUse: Short-term display of less valuable artwork, decorative purposes, temporary framing

materials.name: Conservation Mat Board
materials.description: Acid-free, lignin-free cotton or alpha cellulose matting
drawbacks: Limited color selection compared to standard
materials.recommendedUse: Long-term display of moderately valuable artwork, photographs, limited editions, signed pieces

materials.name: Museum Mat Board
materials.recommendedUse: Valuable artwork, museum pieces, historical documents, heirlooms, investment-grade art

materials.name: Fabric Mat
materials.description: Mat board covered with fabric, usually linen or silk
materials.lifespan: Depends on fabric and backing quality
